name: Peter Benjamin Parker
biography: Bitten by a radioactive spider, Peter Parker's spider abilities give him incredible powers that he uses to help others, while his personal life continues to offer many obstacles..

name: Carol Danvers
biography: Carol Danvers becomes one of the most powerful heroes in the universe when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

name: Robert Bruce Banner
biography: Dr. Bruce Banner lives a life caught between the soft-spoken scientist he has always been and the uncontrollable green monster driven by his rage

name: Natalia (Natasha) Alianovna Romanova
biography: Natasha Romanoff, separated from the now fractured Avengers, confronts the dark path she took to become a spy and assassin, as well as the events that followed.

name: Matthew Michael Murdock
biography: Blinded in a childhood accident, lawyer Matt Murdock protects Hell's Kitchen as the masked vigilante, Daredevil.

name: James Howlett
biography: A mutant with unstoppable healing power, adamantium metal claws, and a no-nonsense attitude makes the man named Logan one of the fiercest heroes in the universe.

name: Steven Rogers
biography: Recipient of the Super Soldier serum, World War II hero Steve Rogers fights for American ideals as one of the world's most powerful heroes and the leader of the Avengers.

name: Anthony Edward 'Tony' Stark
biography: Genius. Multimillionaire. Philanthropist. Tony Stark's confidence is matched only by his high-flying abilities as the hero called Iron Man.

name: Thor Odinson
biography: The son of Odin uses his powerful abilities as the God of Thunder to protect his home Asgard and planet Earth alike.

name: Unrevealed
biography: She apparently learned to use her shapeshifting power at a very young age, as there is no evidence known to the public or the government that Raven Darkholme ever resembled anything more than a normal human being.

name: Felicia Hardy
biography: Black Cat follows in her father's footsteps by learning the tricks of the trade for theft, eventually losing her criminal ways of fighting for the greater good.

name: Avengers
biography: Earth's Mightiest Heroes stand as the planet's first line of defense against the universe's most powerful threats.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy
biography: Think of them as good guys... with an unconventional approach to the superhero business.

name: Defenders
biography: Although it has evolved in membership over the years, The Defenders always pursue the same goal: protect the innocent from any threat.

name: X-Men
biography: Charles Xavier's team of merry mutants are charged with the mission of protecting a world that hates and fears them for their unusual appearances and abilities.

name: Fantastic Four
biography: Mister Fantastic, Invisible Woman, Human Torch, and the Thing use their scientific backgrounds to band together and defend the world against dangerous threats.

name: Inhumans
biography: Created as an experiment by the alien Kree race, the Inhumans are a strain of humanity with extraordinary abilities.
